Privacy Policy

Effective as of: April 29, 2024

This Privacy Notice is designed to help you understand how Moone (“Moone,” “we,” “us,” or “our”) collects, uses, and shares your personal information and to help you understand and exercise your privacy rights.

Moone is owned and operated by Kristelle Feghali, an individual based in France.

We are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy and will use your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”), the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (“CCPA”), the California Privacy Rights Act (“CPRA”), and other applicable laws, regulations, and guidelines.

Scope

This Privacy Notice applies to personal information processed by us via the Moone mobile application (the “App”) and our website at https://getmoone.com (the “Site”). To simplify, we refer to the App, the Site, and related features collectively as the “Services.”

Changes to This Privacy Notice

We may revise this Privacy Notice from time to time at our sole discretion. If material changes occur, we will notify you as required by applicable law. Continued use of our Services after the changes take effect constitutes your acceptance.

1. Personal Information We Collect

We collect the following types of personal information based on your interactions with Moone:

  • Account Creation: Email address, name, and Apple/Google profile information.
  • Nutrition Habits: Food preferences, dietary restrictions, meal frequency, eating window.
  • Photos: Pictures of meals if you upload them (with your device’s permission).
  • Interactive Features: Comments, social features, shared content (public if posted in shared areas).
  • Purchases: Payment and transaction-related details (processed via third-party services; Moone does not store card information).
  • Communications: Your correspondence with us, including support inquiries.
  • Surveys: Voluntary feedback you may provide.
  • Device and usage data (e.g., IP address, browser type, app activity, location via IP).
  • Analytics (e.g., via tools like Amplitude—data is anonymized for analysis).

We may receive personal data from third-party platforms (e.g., Google, Apple, app stores) when you interact with Moone through those services.

2. How We Use Your Information

  • AI-powered nutrition insights and recommendations
  • Account management and support
  • Feature access and communication
  • Purchase processing
  • Fraud detection and prevention
  • Service improvement and debugging
  • Research, development, and analytics
  • Legal compliance and enforcement

We may send personalized content and marketing messages (e.g., email campaigns, interest-based ads). You may opt-out by emailing support@getmoone.com.

  • With your consent
  • For aggregated, de-identified insights
  • To help you share content with friends

3. How We Share Your Information

  • Service Providers: Hosting, analytics, support, and payment services
  • Business Partners: If you engage with joint offerings
  • Advertising Partners: For personalized marketing
  • APIs/SDKs: Integrated tools to support functionality

We may disclose information if required by law or to protect rights, safety, or enforce agreements.

In case of merger, acquisition, or similar events, your data may be transferred.

4. Your Privacy Rights & Choices

  • Push Notifications: Manage via your device settings
  • Location Access: Can be disabled on your device
  • Do Not Track: We do not respond to browser DNT signals
  • Ad Preferences: Opt out of interest-based ads via your device or industry tools (NAI, DAA, etc.)

You may have the right to:

  • Access or correct your data
  • Request deletion or restrict processing
  • Object to processing or withdraw consent
  • Transfer your data

To exercise your rights, contact kristelle@getmoone.com.

5. Data Security

We use reasonable measures to secure your information. However, no system is completely secure. We may notify you of any breaches via email or within the App.

6. International Data Transfers

As Moone is based in France and operates globally (including U.S. markets), your data may be transferred outside the EEA. We use standard contractual clauses and other safeguards to protect your data.

7. Data Retention

Your data is stored for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide our Services. You can delete your data via the App or by emailing support@getmoone.com.

8. U.S. State-Specific Rights

  • We do not sell your data.
  • You have the right to access, delete, correct, and opt out of sharing.
  • Contact us to exercise these rights at support@getmoone.com with subject line: “California Privacy Request”.
  • We do not sell your data.
  • You may opt out of targeted advertising and profiling (Virginia).

9. Children’s Privacy

Moone is not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect their data. If you believe a child has submitted data to us, email support@getmoone.com for removal.

10. Third-Party Services

We are not responsible for third-party services linked through our App or Site. Please review their privacy policies independently.

11. Supervisory Authority

If you are located in the EEA or UK and have concerns, you may contact your local data protection authority.

12. Contact Us

Data Controller - Kristelle Feghali

Email - kristelle@getmoone.com or support@getmoon.com
